name: Mad Labs
description:
Mad Labs is a 2D Arena Fighter where you use pills and other items around the lab to fight off the other scientists. 

Game Features 3 other AI controlled characters, as well as a fully customisable player screen.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Eat Pill - E
  • Throw Weapon - R
  • Fire - Left Mouse Button

Game Created for the Special Effects Game Jam hosted by LevelUp UK(01/05/20)-(03-05/20). The Theme was Side Effects

Team:

Luke Owen - Programming

Lewis Jordan - Programming

Taylor Ring - Programming

Mia Mohac - 2D Art

Oliver Meade - 2D Art
